title: Mercurius Britanicus, or, The English intelligencer a tragic-comedy at Paris : acted with great applause.
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
notes: A Latin and three English editions were published in 1641.
Caption title: The censure of the judges, or, The covrt cvre.
A political satire on the ship-money controversy.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
